title: Beginning Node.js, Express & MongoDB Development
author: Greg Lim
review: Short, sweet, and loaded with working examples.

title: Pat the Bunny
author: Dorothy Kunhardt
review: Who doesn't like patting bunnies?  Story was too complex, though.

title: The React Workshop
author: Richey, Brandon
review: Typos and errors in the very first exercises.  Do not recommend.
